message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product for $1,400,000. While it's worth significantly more to me, I believe this price represents a substantial value proposition for you, allowing you to realize a healthy profit. Consider this a unique opportunity to acquire a product that can benefit your business greatly.  If you choose not to proceed, I have another buyer lined up who is willing to pay my full asking price. Let me know your decision!
